data.event: The city of Cuba, Kansas was founded in 1868 by American southerners traveling westward after the American Civil War.

event.title: moved to its present location in 1884

data.event: The entire town of Cuba moved to its present location in 1884 in order to be on the railroad that had been built through that territory.

event.title: were highlighted on the "CBS News Sunday Morning

data.event: Cuba, Kansas and Jim Richardson were highlighted on the "CBS News Sunday Morning" show in 1983 and May 9, 2004 as well as the May 2004 issue of National Geographic magazine.
